article_title: BEPS Rears Its Head In Amazon European Tax Policy Shift

article_metadata.author: Joe Harpaz

og.description: Amazon made headlines around the world this week when it announced that it would change the way it accounts for revenue from retail sales in Europe. Under the new arrangement, Amazon will book all revenue from retail sales in individual countries in those countries, rather than routing the profits through Luxembourg, which has the lowest corporate tax rate in the European Union.
